title: 'Torn' singer Natalie Imbruglia welcomes first child
text:
Cape Town – Torn singer, Natalie Imbruglia has welcomed her first child.

The 44-year-old shared the news on Instagram on Tuesday. "Welcome to the world," she wrote, revealing her newborn son’s name: Max Valentine Imbruglia.

"My heart is bursting," she gushed.

SEE THE POST HERE:

According to HELLO! She first announced her pregnancy in July, joking that she didn’t "swallow a watermelon".

"I’m expecting my first child this Autumn. For those of you that know me, this has been something I have wanted for a very long time and I’m blessed that this is possible with the help of IVF and a sperm donor.

"I’m so excited about this next adventure..."

SEE THAT POST HERE:
description: Natalie Imbruglia has given birth to a baby boy!
